Text: Thank you so very much, once again, dear rkstr for being the one-stop Project Runway shop.. what would we do without you!??
I registered just to say thank you! Your work is much appreciated!
Thank you so very much! And please don't go :( What would we do without you?!
If I wasn't gay I would give you my first born.

Thanks again rkstr.....
What are we going to do without you?
Here on the other side of the world we look out for your uploads with much anticipation.
Very sad to see you go, that's gonna make it impossible for so many to watch these  :(

ARRRrkstr! I spy wit'me eye what ye mean when ye shouts about shelling out doubloons fer Projeckt Fashion Plank AU...  I be tryin' to figger how to help ye - but th' coffers in me galleon be empty as well, an' th' most idiot box I be watching' only be huntin' ghosties or fashion & artistic design competitions.

I will have someone filling in for me while I have a break - he must be insane and I'm so grateful.He will be uploading using the same accounts as me so it'll be pretty much business as usual.
He might not be as fast as me to get things up on here but I'm sure we'll all be patient and lovely to him and not scare him away as he's doing me/us a big favour

Enjoy your break, rkstr, you're da best!

@bored0m, LOL
